name: Ch20ABaseConvo1
_source: speak;Larachel;Behold, my loyal companions!|Our quest to purge this world of evil is truly divine!|Bards shall sing of our exploits for generations to come!
speak;Dozla;Gwah ha ha!|Absolutely, Lady L'Arachel!|Our mighty deeds will echo through the ages!|None shall forget the name of L'Arachel, beautiful princess of peerless beauty!
speak;Rennac;*sigh*|All I'm wondering is if any of these "mighty deeds" will actually earn us some gold.
speak;Larachel;Gold?|Oh, Rennac, your mind is always fixated on such trivial matters!|The rewards of virtue are beyond any worldly treasure!
speak;Dozla;Gwah ha ha!|Well said, milady!|There is no greater reward than serving alongside the radiant L'Arachel!
speak;Rennac;I could think of several greater rewards.|Starting with proper compensation for risking my life daily.

speak;Larachel;Listen well!|When we vanquish the Demon King, all the world will shower us with praise!|Your name shall be etched in history as one of the <red>Heroes of Magvel</>!|Is that not payment enough?
speak;Rennac;I'd prefer payment in actual currency, if it's all the same to you.
speak;Dozla;Gwah ha ha!|Rennac, you jest!|To serve Lady L'Arachel is a privilege beyond measure!
speak;Rennac;A privilege I never actually signed up for, I might add.
speak;Larachel;Rennac!|Your persistent focus on material gain wounds me deeply!|As a noble servant of the divine, you should aspire to loftier ideals!
speak;Rennac;I'd settle for lofty amounts of gold.|Or just being allowed to leave your service.

speak;Larachel;Nonsense!|You are blessed to accompany me on this sacred mission!|When we triumph, and the <red>Light of Rausten</> shines upon all Magvel,|you will understand the true value of our quest!
speak;Dozla;Gwah ha ha!|Indeed, milady!|We shall be remembered as the greatest heroes of all time!
speak;Rennac;Just once I'd like to be remembered as "that rich merchant" instead of "that poor fool who follows L'Arachel around."
speak;Larachel;Come, my faithful companions!|Victory awaits us!|The forces of evil shall tremble before our righteous might!
speak;Rennac;Onward to an early grave, more likely...|*sigh*|At least let me negotiate for a percentage of any treasure we find!
